subtitle: Add some wild mushrooms into this easy vegetarian recipe for an extra special touch.

method.text: Cook the pasta in boiling water for 10-12 min, or according to pack instructions, until 'al dente'.
Heat the butter in a frying pan. Fry the mushrooms until softened. Stir in the creme fraiche. Remove from heat. Add the basil and seasoning.
Drain the pasta well. Place in a large bowl. Add the pesto and creme fraiche mixture. Toss untl pasta is well coated.
Divide the pasta on serving plates or dish. Sprinkle over the Parmesan.

title: Pasta with mushroom, basil and creme fraiche
